name: Unstable Valley
description:
SPACE will cut off text early!

Directions! There is a tutorial, and a README file also. 

Audio game, headphones recommended

The objective of the game is to capture the three neutral resources, then have enough resources to build a siege engine to form a surrender and stabilize the region. You and your enemy can not attack each others bases directly, but you will be in a constant tug of war for resources in the center of the map. 

If any of your units and enemy units are on the same resource they will battle until one side is dead. Villagers are rather awful at combat, so make sure that there are always soldiers with them if they are in the middle or they will be picked off. 

1- 9 will begin the game with that difficulty

SPACE: Will stop the narrator from speaking.

IN GAME:

Before creating army you need to select a target region

Down: Will target your farms. Only villagers can be sent here.

Left: Target the gold mines. Villagers sent here will collect gold. Send military here to defeat enemy military and protect your villagers.

Up: Target the woods. Villagers sent here will collect wood. Send military here to defeat enemy military and protect your villagers.

Right: Target the iron mines. Villager sent here will collect iron. Send military here to defeat enemy military and protect your villagers.

To create units, press – 1-4

1: Villagers, 10 food. Gather resources. They will fight against enemy units, but are poor fighters. 

2: Mercenaries 5 gold 5 food. Strong against villagers and knights. 

3: Archers 5 wood 5 food. Strong against villagers and mercenaries.

4. Knights 5 gold 5 food. Strong against villagers and archers

5: Create a siege engine. You need to have complete control of the map and 100 of each resource to use it.

ESCAPE: take you back to main menu.
